Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8863 EAST. 34TH STREET NORTH, WICHITA, Kansas, 67226, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AgEagle Aerial Systems Inc is a provider of drone imagery data analytics for the precision and sustainable agriculture markets. It designs, produces, distributes, and supports technologically- advanced small unmanned aerial systems (UAVs) that it offers for sale commercially to the precision agriculture industry. The company's revenue is derived primarily through the sales of drone and drone-related products and services, sensors and related accessories, and software subscriptions.
